Generation V.Black: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as "The Guardian of the Fields."
Generation V.White: The energy that comes pouring from its tail increases the nutrition in the soil, making crops grow to great size.
Generation V.Black 2: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.
Generation V.White 2: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.

Generation VI.X: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as "The Guardian of the Fields."
Generation VI.Y: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as "The Guardian of the Fields."
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.

Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Landorus soars through the sky in this form, bestowing plentiful harvests upon the land and earning the people's reverence. It can traverse the whole of Hisui in a mere couple of hours.
